# Preface {.unnumbered}

This is a summary of the R programming skills sessions of the Experimental Design and Data Management (2223-MSB1005) course 2022. The course is part of the [Master of Systems Biology](https://www.maastrichtuniversity.nl/education/master/systems-biology) at the Maastrich University. The course is taught by [Prof. Michiel Adriaens](https://www.maastrichtuniversity.nl/nl/michiel.adriaens) and [Prof. Aaron Isaacs](https://www.maastrichtuniversity.nl/nl/a.isaacs).
